title: Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025 exhibitor list revealed
description: The Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025 being organised by the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) will be held between January 17 and 22, 2025 in New Delhi. The number of two- and four-wheeler brands participating in next year's edition is said to be more than those of the first edition held this year. We bring you the complete list of all brands that are present at the Expo and also the ones that will skip the event. Auto Expo 2025 opens to the public on January 19 EV-only brands like Ather, Ola, Vinfast and BYD will be present Bajaj, Honda, Hero Moto Corp among major two-wheeler brands Auto Expo 2025 list of car, SUV brands The confirmed list of mass-market carmakers participating in the Expo includes Tata Motors, Toyota India, Maruti Suzuki, MG Motor, Hyundai, Kia, Mahindra, BMW India, Skoda India, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche and Isuzu Motors. Additionally, Vietnamese EV brand Vinfast, which plans to enter India, will also showcase its line-up. Chinese EV brand, BYD, will also have its cars and SUVs on display. Brands like Honda, Audi, Volkswagen, Citroen, Jeep and Nissan will not be present at the show. Auto Expo 2025 list bike, scooter brands Two-wheeler brands like Suzuki Motorcycle, TVS, Yamaha India, Bajaj Auto, Honda two wheelers, Ather energy and Ola Electric will be present at the show. Bharat Mobility Global Expo event, location details The Bharat Mobility Global Expo has been split in three locations. The Auto Expo will be held at the Bharat Mandapam (Pragati Maidan) between January 17 and 22. The event will be open for media and dealers on January 17 and 18, and for the general public from January 19-22. This location will also have events like the India International Tyre show, the India cycle show 2025 and the Bharat Battery show. The Auto Expo 2025 Components show will be held at Yashobhoomi Centre at Dwarka in Delhi from January 18 to 21. The third location will cater to the Bharat Construction equipment show and the Urban mobility show that will be held at the India Expo Centre and Mart at Greater Noida from January 19 to 22.
author: Akbar Merchant

html:
The Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025, previously called the Auto Expo, will see participation from over 30 car and bike makers.

The Bharat Mobility Global Expo 2025 being organised by the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM) will be held between January 17 and 22, 2025 in New Delhi. The number of two- and four-wheeler brands participating in next year's edition is said to be more than those of the first edition held this year. We bring you the complete list of all brands that are present at the Expo and also the ones that will skip the event.

  • Auto Expo 2025 opens to the public on January 19
  • EV-only brands like Ather, Ola, Vinfast and BYD will be present
  • Bajaj, Honda, Hero Moto Corp among major two-wheeler brands

Auto Expo 2025 list of car, SUV brands

The confirmed list of mass-market carmakers participating in the Expo includes Tata Motors, Toyota India, Maruti Suzuki, MG Motor, Hyundai, Kia, Mahindra, BMW India, Skoda India, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche and Isuzu Motors.

Additionally, Vietnamese EV brand Vinfast, which plans to enter India, will also showcase its line-up. Chinese EV brand, BYD, will also have its cars and SUVs on display.

Brands like Honda, Audi, Volkswagen, Citroen, Jeep and Nissan will not be present at the show.

Auto Expo 2025 list bike, scooter brands

Two-wheeler brands like Suzuki Motorcycle, TVS, Yamaha India, Bajaj Auto, Honda two wheelers, Ather energy and Ola Electric will be present at the show.

Bharat Mobility Global Expo event, location details

The Bharat Mobility Global Expo has been split in three locations. The Auto Expo will be held at the Bharat Mandapam (Pragati Maidan) between January 17 and 22. The event will be open for media and dealers on January 17 and 18, and for the general public from January 19-22. This location will also have events like the India International Tyre show, the India cycle show 2025 and the Bharat Battery show.

The Auto Expo 2025 Components show will be held at Yashobhoomi Centre at Dwarka in Delhi from January 18 to 21.

The third location will cater to the Bharat Construction equipment show and the Urban mobility show that will be held at the India Expo Centre and Mart at Greater Noida from January 19 to 22.
